name: TIC-Cloth3D
description:
A 3D cloth simulator made in TIC-80.

Controls (Keyboard):
- WASD: Rotate.
Controls (Interaction buttons):
- Rotate: Turntable mode with LMB and trackball mode with RMB.
- Grab/Pin: LMB to grab and unpin, RMB to grab and pin.
- Cut: LMB to remove connective edges.

GitHub: https://github.com/pke1029/tic-cloth3d
